work.title: Job with both link to employer site and highlights
highlights: Worked on Model and Simulation of DRAM-PCM Dual Architecture with Dr. Chengmo Yang
Developed simulators for various parts of the architecture
Tested the algorithms and analyzed the results
Presented research findings at research seminar
